resource.name: AuthorizationApplication
resource.description: Authorizations for resource (application) access management. Be carefull with this application, administrator must have all authorizations Do not let public user have PUT/POST/DELETE authorizations
resource.author: AKKA Technologies

resource.name: NotificationApplication
resource.description: Application for registering observables and observers and for notifying observers when observable changes.
resource.author: AKKA Technologies

resource.name: LogDirectory
resource.description: This application give access to the server logs It would be better to give authorizations only to the administrator
resource.author: AKKA Technologies

resource.name: client-public
resource.description: web client application for public resources used by other sitools client applications -> Administrator must have all authorizations on this application -> Public user must have at least GET and PUT authorizations on this application PUT authorization is used to reset User password
resource.author: AKKA Technologies

resource.name: client-admin
resource.description: The application is used by the administrator to access the Web client administrator application -> public user must have GET authorization otherwise the login page will be unavailable -> administrator user must have GET authorization has well
resource.author: AKKA Technologies

resource.name: client-user
resource.description: This application is used by users-> to access the Web client application-> to access the portal page-> to access the desktop page
resource.author: AKKA Technologies

resource.name: UsersAndGroupsAdministration
resource.description: Users and groups management
resource.author: AKKA Technologies

resource.name: InscriptionApplication
resource.description: Management of user registrations.
resource.author: AKKA Technologies

resource.name: UserInscriptionApplication
resource.description: User inscription management on client side -> Administrator must have all authorizations-> Public user must have at least POST right in order to register
resource.author: AKKA Technologies

resource.name: RoleApplication
resource.description: Roles management
resource.author: AKKA Technologies

resource.name: OrderAdministration
resource.description: Management of off-line or asynchronous orders
resource.author: AKKA Technologies

resource.name: UserOrderApplication
resource.description: Application allowing users to follow their orders. -> Administrator must have all authorizations-> Public user must have GET/POST/DELETE authorizations to retrieve, create or delete its orders
resource.author: AKKA Technologies

resource.name: UserStorageManagement
resource.description: Management of user space disk on server
resource.author: AKKA Technologies

resource.name: UserStorageApplication
resource.description: Access to users space disk on server The security on this application is a bit different -> The owner of the userstorage has all rights on its userstorage -> Otherwise the application authorizations are used
resource.author: AKKA Technologies

resource.name: ConverterPluginsApplication
resource.description: Exposition of converters classes
resource.author: AKKA Technologies

resource.name: FilterPluginsApplication
resource.description: Expose the classes of search filter plugins
resource.author: AKKA Technologies

resource.name: ResourceClassPluginApplication
resource.description: Exposition of dynamic resources classes
resource.author: AKKA Technologies

resource.name: ApplicationFilterClassPluginApplication
resource.description: Exposition of dynamic filters classes
resource.author: AKKA Technologies

resource.name: StorageApplication
resource.description: Storage service - Gives access to the files on the storages -> The administrator does not need authorizations-> The public user must have all authorizations according to ones specified on each storage. (Default GET and HEAD to authorize clients to detect content-type of a file)
resource.author: AKKA Technologies

resource.name: StorageAdministration
resource.description: Administration of Storage service -> The administrator must have all authorizations
resource.author: AKKA Technologies

resource.name: MailAdministration
resource.description: Application used to send emails
resource.author: AKKA Technologies

resource.name: UploadApplication
resource.description: Upload pictures, logos for using in datasets, projects, ...-> administrator user can have GET/POST/PUT/DELETE authorizations to access, add or delete files or folder -> public must have GET/POST authorization to access and upload the files In order to upload files using the ExtJs client, the HTTP-BASIC credentials can be sended in the cookie
resource.author: AKKA Technologies

resource.name: TemporaryFolderApplication
resource.description: Application to access a temporary folder on the server -> administrator user can have GET/POST/PUT/DELETE authorizations to access, add or delete files or folder -> public can have GET authorization to access the folders In order to download files using the ExtJs client, the HTTP-BASIC credentials can be sended in the cookie
resource.author: AKKA Technologies

resource.name: OrdersFolderApplication
resource.description: Application to access a folder dedicated to orders management -> administrator user can have GET/POST/PUT/DELETE authorizations to access, add or delete files or folder -> public must not have GET authorization not to access the folders
resource.author: AKKA Technologies

resource.name: AdministratorApplication
resource.description: Miscellaneous resources for Administrators
resource.author: AKKA Technologies

resource.name: TaskApplicationForUser
resource.description: Exposes the list of tasks for a particular user,Only a particular User can access its tasks, he must have GET, PUT and DELETE rights on this application
resource.author: AKKA Technologies

resource.name: TaskApplicationForAdmin
resource.description: Exposes the list of all tasks
resource.author: AKKA Technologies

resource.name: UnitsApplication
resource.description: Application for unit utilities
resource.author: AKKA Technologies

resource.name: DimensionAdministration
resource.description: Application to manage DimensionsAdministrator must have all rights on this applicationpublic user must have GET right to access the dimension from the client-user interface
resource.author: AKKA Technologies

resource.name: GuiServiceApplication
resource.description: Management of GUI components for client Gui Services.
resource.author: AKKA Technologies

resource.name: GuiServicePluginApplication
resource.description: Management of GUI plugin services on a dataset
resource.author: AKKA Technologies

resource.name: ServiceApplication
resource.description: Management of services on a dataset
resource.author: AKKA Technologies

resource.name: AppRegistryApplication
resource.description: Application for registering / exposing all applications Be carrefull with this application, the administrator must have all authorizations Do not stop the application, Do not let public user have PUT/POST/DELETE authorizations
resource.author: AKKA Technologies
